string-array.name: fQuestions
string-array.item: "The mass and volume of a human are 70 kg and 0.0711 m^3 respectively. What is the human's density in kg/m^3?"
"The density of water is 1000 kg/m^3. What is the mass of 1 litre of water in kg?"
"The density of gold is 19.32 g/cm^3. If a piece of gold has mass 20.00 kg, what is its volume in cm^3?"

string-array.name: kQuestions
string-array.item: "Usain Bolt ran 100 m in 9.58 s. What was his average speed?"
"Quan Hao run 2.4 km with an average speed of 4 m/s. How long does he take (in seconds)?"
"Cheng Yi ran for 2 minutes with a speed of 3 m/s in a straight line. What distance did he travelled (in metres)?"

string-array.name: mQuestions
string-array.item: "Which of the following is not a physical quantity?"
"Which of the following is a base quantity?"
"What is the SI unit of mass?"
